name: WhatsBot
description: WhatsBot project - Makes it easy and fun to use Whatsapp.

ASENA_SESSION.description: Special session code you created with Qr.Js.

SUDO.description: Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: The language of the boat. Bot language. English => en, Malayalam => ml... etc

SEND_READ.description: If you want to throw seen, type true.

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: Removes the background of photos. https://remove.bg

NO_ONLINE.description: If you don't want to appear online, type true.
